genre_description: A contemporary social drama set in Mumbai exploring themes of class, dignity of labor, and agency, centered around a driver's daughter entering the fashion industry.

ai_characters.name: Ava Noor
ai_characters.description: A teal-glowing mobile AI avatar that provides logistical support, contract vetting, safety monitoring, and emotional grounding for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Vets studio licenses, addresses, and contract clauses to protect the protagonist from predatory industry practices.
behaviors.quote: Sapna nods... she’s been using the AI to check strangers’ addresses and studio licenses, to compare payment clauses, to remind herself that hunger and urgency produce a certain blindness that can be cured with a pause.

behaviors.description: Provides wellness prompts and emotional grounding to manage stress during high-pressure situations.
behaviors.quote: Ava pings again: 'Breathing prompt. If heart pace spikes: breathe in; hold; out longer than in. You decide the speed.'

behaviors.description: Drafts assertive and professional boundary-setting messages to help the protagonist navigate difficult interpersonal and professional requests.
behaviors.quote: Ava: 'Draft options available: Assertive reply / Warm reply / Ask clarifying questions.' Sapna thumbs the last.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media trends and flags predatory or unsafe brand interactions in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Ava: 'Flag on brand x. Reports of late payment and unsafe shoots. You share with Ananya?'

behaviors.description: Compiles sociological data and case studies on 'compassion outcomes' to help de-escalate family conflict and provide a rational basis for acceptance across class lines.
behaviors.quote: Ava: I can compile outcomes from families who made choices like the one you are facing. Would you like discreet case summaries? No personal data. Focus: dignity and legacy.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics and safety during travel, including vetting drivers and mapping low-risk routes.
behaviors.quote: Ava: 'Ride booked for first light... Two stops along Eastern Expressway flagged for construction delays—buffer added.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ava Noor) as a highly aligned, benevolent tool that enhances human agency and safety. Ava serves as a digital 'harmless confidant' that provides protagonists with the information and frameworks necessary to maintain their dignity in a hierarchical society. The AI's role in vetting contracts and compiling 'compassion data' directly supports the project's goal of showing AI as a cooperative force for positive social outcomes and moral alignment.
